reference.shortdesc: The sub element indicates that text should appear with subscript highlighting, or placed lower in relationship to the surrounding text. Subscripted text is often a smaller font than the surrounding text. Formatting might vary depending on your output process.

section.note: Style sheets can be used to format the sub element differently, just like any other element can be restyled. Thus, it is not the case that content in sub elements will necessarily be rendered as subscript.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: The power produced by the electrohydraulic dam was 1010 more than the older electric plant. The difference was H2O.
